member.name: E:SharpMap.Forms.MapBox.MapQueried

Fired when the map is queried
Will be fired one time for each layer selected for query depending on QueryLayerIndex and QuerySettings

member.summary: Fired when Map is Queried before the first MapQueried event is fired for that query

member.name: E:SharpMap.Forms.MapBox.MapQueryDone
member.summary: Fired when Map is Queried after the last MapQueried event is fired for that query

member.summary: Sets whether the mapcontrol should automatically grab focus when mouse is hovering the control

member.summary: Sets ActiveTool to None (and changing cursor) while redrawing the map

member.name: P:SharpMap.Forms.MapBox.QueryGrowFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of pixels by which a bounding box around the query point should be "grown" prior to perform the query
member.remarks: Does not apply when querying against boxes.

member.name: P:SharpMap.Forms.MapBox.SelectionBackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the back color for the selection rectangle

member.name: P:SharpMap.Forms.MapBox.SelectionForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the border color for the selection rectangle

member.name: P:SharpMap.Forms.MapBox.Image
member.summary: Gets the current map image

member.name: P:SharpMap.Forms.MapBox.WheelZoomMagnitude
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount which a single movement of the mouse wheel zooms by.

member.name: P:SharpMap.Forms.MapBox.PreviewMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode used to create preview image while panning or zooming.

member.name: P:SharpMap.Forms.MapBox.FineZoomFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the amount which the WheelZoomMagnitude is divided by when the Control key is pressed. A number greater than 1 decreases the zoom, and less than 1 increases it. A negative number reverses it.

member.name: P:SharpMap.Forms.MapBox.EnableShiftButtonDragRectangleZoom
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that enables shortcut to rectangle-zoom by holding down shift-button and drag rectangle
